plot: The Stig tests the Honda NSX Type R, as Jeremy drives the Renault Vel Satis, and the Mercedes-Benz SL55 AMG. The grannies are back; Hammond tests the new BMW Z4, and Tara Palmer-Tomkinson is the next star in a reasonably-priced car.

The Stig tests the super-fast, mid-engine sports car, Honda NSX Type R, while Jeremy drives the spacious French executive car, Renault Vel Satis. In the meantime, the grannies are back for yet another challenge, as Jason takes them to experience the thrills of handbrake parking in a small Mini. Hammond takes the German roadster, BMW Z4, for a spin--and then--Jeremy tests the fast automatic car, the Mercedes-Benz SL55 AMG. In the end, British actress, Tara Palmer-Tomkinson, or TP-T, is the next star in a reasonably-priced car.—Nick Riganas
